note:
canecapovolto is a group active since 1992 in the fields of video, collage art, sound art, field recordings, electronic music.

Scuola FuoriNorma was founded in 2016 with the aim of developing an experiential teaching model (theory comes from practice and not vice versa) through workshops and seminars. In short, it is important not to teach but to ensure that people learn.
